shows.title: Batman Begins
shows.description: Bruce Wayne becomes Batman and begins his fight against crime in Gotham City.

shows.title: The Dark Knight
shows.description: Batman faces off against the Joker in a battle for Gotham's soul.

shows.title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
shows.description: Batman and Superman face off while a new threat looms.

shows.title: The Batman
shows.description: A young Batman uncovers corruption in Gotham and faces the Riddler.

shows.title: Avengers: Endgame
shows.description: The Avengers assemble one last time to reverse Thanos' snap.

shows.title: The Avengers
shows.description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together to stop Loki and his alien army.

shows.title: Inception
shows.description: A skilled thief enters dreams to steal secrets, but faces his toughest challenge yet.

shows.title: Joker
shows.description: Arthur Fleck, a failed comedian, descends into madness and becomes the Joker.

shows.title: Jurassic Park
shows.description: A theme park suffers a major security breakdown and dinosaurs escape.

shows.title: Avengers: Infinity War
shows.description: The Avengers face their greatest threat yet â€” Thanos.

shows.title: Inside Out
shows.description: A young girl navigates emotions like Joy and Sadness in this Pixar animation.

shows.title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
shows.description: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight and others to save the galaxy from the Empire's battle station.

shows.title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
shows.description: After the Rebels are brutally overpowered by the Empire, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda.

shows.title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
shows.description: After rescuing Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the Rebels attempt to destroy the second Death Star.

shows.title: Avatar
shows.description: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

shows.title: The Matrix
shows.description: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of reality and his role in the war against its controllers.
